text: The Chilean ambassador in Tel Aviv is the official representative of the Government in Santiago de Chile to the Government of Israel. == List of Representatives == {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic accreditation !| ambassador !| Observations !| List of Presidents of Chile !| List of Presidents of Israel !| Term end |- | |Carlos Diemer Johannsen | |Salvador Allende Gossens |Zalman Shazar | |- | |Julio Barrenechea Divinetz |Chargé d'affaires |Augusto Pinochet Ugarte |Ephraim Katzir | |- | |Samuel Gleiser Daj |Married to Mrs. Juanita Portugues Guingues |Augusto Pinochet Ugarte |Ephraim Katzir | |- | |Jorge Gana Eastman | |Augusto Pinochet Ugarte |Ephraim Katzir | |- | | | |Augusto Pinochet Ugarte |Yitzhak Navon | |- | |Santiago Benadava Cattán | |Augusto Pinochet Ugarte |Yitzhak Navon | |- | |Víctor Varela Palma |Chargé d'affaires |Augusto Pinochet Ugarte |Chaim Herzog | |- | |Nilo Floody Buxton | |Augusto Pinochet Ugarte |Chaim Herzog | |- | |Santiago Benadava Cattán | |Augusto Pinochet Ugarte |Chaim Herzog | |- | |Jorge Massa Armijo | |Augusto Pinochet Ugarte |Chaim Herzog | |- | |Marcos Alvarez García | |Patricio Aylwin Azócar |Chaim Herzog | |- | |Jorge Tapia Valdés | |Eduardo Frei Ruiz-Tagle |Ezer Weizman | |- | |José Rodríguez Elizondo | |Eduardo Frei Ruiz-Tagle |Ezer Weizman | |- | |Sally Bendersky Schachner | |Ricardo Lagos Escobar |Moshe Katsav | |- | |Irene Bronfman | |Michelle Bachelet |Moshe Katsav | |- | |Joaquin Montes (Chilean diplomat) | |Sebastián Piñera |Shimon Peres | |- | | | |Sebastián Piñera |Shimon Peres | |- | |Mónica Jiménez | |Michelle Bachelet |Reuven Rivlin | |- | |Rodrigo Fernández Gaete |Embajada de Chile en Israel, , designated: Rodrigo Fernández Gaete |Sebastián Piñera |Reuven Rivlin | |} Hugo Harvey Parada, Chile - Israel relations 1973-1990. title: List of ambassadors of Chile to Israel
